Title: Requires home health aides and nurse's aides to receive training in working with lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender individuals
Summary: Requires home health aides and nurse's aides to receive training in working with lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender individuals as part of the education and training for certification; directs the commissioner of health to develop curriculum in accordance with specified information.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to requiring home health aides and nurse's aides to receive training in working with lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender individuals
